basics.name: Bram Kok
basics.label: Frontend developer
basics.summary: I'm a frontend developer with 10+ years experience in developing and designing web-based products and applications.

work.summary: iBOOD is Europe's first and largest day-to-date site. For ten years, iBOOD has offered a brand new A-brand brand at the very best internet price.
highlights: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), React, Next.js
Modernized the frontend web stack from PHP/jQuery to React/Next.js.
Developed a high traffic page with dynamic viewing capabilities in React.
Learned how to do agile development properly within a large team of developers.

work.summary: A year of personal sabbaticle after working for ten years.
highlights: Photography: developed a clear style and aesthetic by doing photography on a full-time basis.
Technology: broadening of skills in React, Node.js, Python, Bash, Docker.

work.summary: Simple Check offers businesses a medical check-up to prevent disease and absenteeism. With a mixture of positivity and new technology they offer employees ways to improve their health.
highlights: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), AngularJS, D3, Node.js
Managed a group of outsourced developers working the backend product.
Developed the front-end product (in Angular.JS) consisting out of a 'Health Dashboard' for customers to gain insights in their health and to improve their health and well being.
Developed marketing, brand, and content strategy around Simple Check.
Hired a full time content marketeer and become an authority on the subject of Health Checks.
Developed a sales strategy with an interactive product demo for sales calls.

work.summary: Team Loyalty turns happy customers into loyal customers. They apply a method called ‘event matching’ that improves customer relationships by investing in professional and personal interests of the customer.
highlights: JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), D3, Node.js
Developed the front-end product for a SaaS solution that offered customer deep insights into their customer relationships.
Managed a group of outsourced developers working the backend product.
Renewed marketing, brand and content around Team Loyalty.
Developed a sales strategy with an interactive product demo for sales calls.

work.summary: Zelfwerven.nl offers intuitive recruitment software for publishing vacancies, receiving applications, reviewing applicants.
highlights: PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Designed and built a web-based product from the ground up with the insights gained from working on a prior recruitment system.
Applied flat design to the interface before it was cool based on products from the 2008 web scene in New York.
Learned how challenging it is to change people their professional working behavior and habits.
Learned how bad it is to be stuck in the design phase of a product for too long.
Learned how bad it is to say yes to every feature request.

work.summary: Bureau Registratie Integriteit Volkshuisvesting informs, screens and commits supervisory board members, directors and managers with an online questionnaire and reporting tool.
highlights: Created a full-stack enviroment for creating and filling out questionnaires
Worked together with compliance officers and learned a lot about laws and policies concerning governance
Learned how supervisory boards that consist out of conservative old-boys networks don't embrace innovation.

highlights: Built a Content Management Applicant Tracking System

work.summary: Luzac is a private school with over twenty schools in The Netherlands where they offer education that's tailored to the students needs.

Applied flat interface design before it was cool based on products from the 2008 tech scene in New York.
